name: The Complex: Expedition
description:
STORY

The Complex: Expedition takes place in 1988, You are a Magwave researcher sent into the Complex with your team to investigate a mysterious situation. When that expedition goes horribly wrong, the player is left alone and lost, wandering the seemingly infinite maze of hallways.



This is a psychological horror experience based on the "Backrooms" urban legend. View the world through a VHS camera and follow along a storyline involving an expedition into the Backrooms.

• Experience the true Backrooms experience.

• Explore the mysterious and unforgiving world of the Backrooms.

NOTE: This game is not connected with Kane Pixels' Backrooms nor the Backrooms Wiki/Fandom, though many parts are very inspired by Kane Pixels.
